DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to analyze the effect of the prophylaxis of venous thromboembolism in the critical ill patients, and at the same time, to find out the risk of venous thromboembolism and hemorrhage events occurred under the prophylaxis.
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Cohort Study of Safety and Effectiveness of Venous Thromboembolism Prophylaxis in Critical Ill Patients
DOC.criteria: all the patients in ICUs estimated time in ICU mare than 48h estimated time in ICU less than 48h refused to attend
